item.description:
Please join us as we discuss the race to genetically engineer and patent the world's food supply and how this effects America. We will be discussing the book Seeds of Destruction by William Engdahl
and
viewing the film
"THE WORLD ACCORDING TO MONSANTO"

This meetUp should be attended by all who EAT!

Control of food is akin to control of currency. (after all what do you spend your money on?) Find out who is attempting to foist control of America and the World via food. Hint: It has a lot to do with who is attempting to control the currency. Please join us and bring a friend for this not to be missed meeting of Inquisitive Minds!

>> FREE<<<

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: REQUIRED VIEWING FOR ALL WHO EAT
